name: WPUF Login Redirect
author: Nayem

sections.description:
In Wp user fronted plugin user can post from fronted. Also user can edit his post from frontend.

This plugin gives you the ability to redirect user of Wp user frontend (free/pro) to specific page. You can set specific page from the parent WP User Frontend plugin settings to redirect your user.

Author: @nayemDevs

Features:

  1. Redirect user to specific page after login through WP User Fronted login page.
  2. Admin can see the page list to select one of them to redirect
sections.installation:
1. You have to install the parent plugin WP User Frontend.
  2. Please navigate to Wp admin->Plugins->Add new. Browse the plugin file and install it.
  3. After activating the plugin you will get option in WP User Frontend->Settings->General->Select redirect page.
sections.faq:
Can I set redirect page from backend

Yes

Can I use any page to redirect in my site

Yes
